closedateRollup: Set the Expected Close Date field on the resulting Opportunity records to be the earliest or latest close dates of the existing Revenue Line Items
line1: If all Revenue Line Items are closed and at least one was won,
line2: the Opportunity Sales Stage is set to Closed Won"."
line3: If all Revenue Line Items are in the Closed Lost" Sales Stage
line4: ,the Opportunity Sales Stage is set to "Closed Lost"."
line5: If any Revenue Line Items are still open,
line6: the Opportunity will be marked with the least-advanced Sales Stage.
